snippet: Red Bulls defender Roy Miller said he intentionally strolled into the penalty area as Chris Wondolowski was taking a penalty kick last Sunday in San Jose, Calif., in an effort to distract him and to force a retake.
abstract: Red Bulls defender Roy Miller said he intentionally strolled into the penalty area as Chris Wondolowski was taking a penalty kick last Sunday in San Jose, Calif., in an effort to distract him and to force a retake.

headline.main: Red Bulls' Miller: 'I Did It on Purpose'
